doc.after: In elections opposing candidates supporters may engage in political vandalism the act of defacing opponents political posters bumper stickers billboards and other street marketing material Although the nature of this material is temporary its effect can be long lasting as it may reflect both negatively and positively on the candidate whose material is being vandalized as well as on the presumed candidate whose supporters are engaging in the vandalism
